name: Threshold Block #2
description:
After a good warmup, complete 2 x 5min Threshold efforts. However, the threshold effort ramps up from low to high threshold over the 5min. 



Recovery time is 1min @ 65% FTP. This is the level at which lactate is cleared at its highest rate.
